text:
Hiya - found an error in the Card log from the beta:

This link (screenshot) seems to direct to
```<https://app.HubSpot.com/companies/12345/company/1234567890>```
but it should be linking to
```<https://app.HubSpot.com/contacts/12345/company/1234567890>```
The link will not direct to the company in question.
Not sure whether contacts & deals - or other objects - are also affected.
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> Data refreshment issue is fixed? when we clicked on different buttons <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C04A3FUK8HK/p1676284887987229?thread_ts=1676009700.754969&cid=C04A3FUK8HK>

Hey folks, just bumping this message. We’re coming up on the deadline for this later next week. Reminder to redeploy any older project you may have hanging around if you’re still actively using them.  :ty:
